contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox radio station | name = XECM | image = | city = [[Ciudad Mante]] | area = [[Ciudad Mante]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Radio Festival | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 1450 AM | format = | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = ORT | webcast = | website = [http://www.ort.com.mx/index.asp ort.com.mx] | affiliations = }} '''XECM''' (branded as Radio Festival) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] AM [[radio station]] that serves the [[Ciudad Mante]], [[Tamaulipas]] market. ==External links== * [http://www.ort.com.mx/index.asp ort.com.mx] * {{AMQ|XECM}} * {{AML|XECM}} * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio / television stations] * [http://radiostationworld.com/locations/Mexico/radio.asp?m=ta~ radiostationworld.com; List of Tamaulipas radio stations] {{Ciudad Mante Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Ciudad Mante]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
